topic: How much has the Russia-Ukraine war cost
title: The Trillion Dollar War ðŸ’¸
narration: The Russia-Ukraine war has cost over one trillion dollars. Russia burns nine hundred million every single day. America has sent one hundred seventy five billion in aid. Ukraine lost thirty percent of its economy. This is the most expensive conflict in Europe since World War Two. And there's no end in sight.
